name: Ruined Mage
description:
Description:

"Ruined Mage" is a wave-based game where you are assigned to protect the Kingdom's Castle from vile creatures seeking destruction.

In order to clear waves as efficiently as possible, certain spell combinations (Fire/Ice/Wind + Enchantment Spell) will allow you to spread damage among multiple enemies.

There are various places in the game where the person with the most waves defeated is mentioned.

Azure PlayFab has been used in order to enable the use of "Authentication" and "Highest ranked mage" features.
